actions: Increase the timeout duration for the failing selector.
Check for recent changes in the Core related to the element.
Validate the element's presence in the DOM before the timeout.
Re-run the test with retries disabled for clearer results.
Review logs for any environmental issues during the run.
Ensure that the Playwright version is compatible with the current Elementor version.
Consider adding a wait condition before the selector is accessed.
Document the failure for future reference.
Monitor for similar failures in upcoming CI runs.
